meanings: oppose, stand against, stand up to, (어려움·문제 등에) face

vlive.korean: 정의라고 하지는 않았어, 뭔가 맞서서 가장 먼저.. I'm saying he stands up for you. 듣기 View video IMFACT : [IMFACT] 데뷔 200일 기념 팬클럽명 공개♥
vlive.english: I'm saying he stands up for you.

vlive.korean: 더위를 직접적으로 맞서서 더위를 이기는 방법이 있잖아요. Sometimes we beat the heat with heat. 듣기 View video IDOL x IDOL : Various - 베리어스 '이열치열이라고 들어보셨나요?'
vlive.english: Sometimes we beat the heat with heat.

vlive.korean: 그래서 오늘은 우리가 한번 이 무더위에 맞서서 여름을 이겨보자. We wanted to sweat out this sweltering summer. 듣기 View video B.I.G : B.I.G(비아이지)의 이열치열!
vlive.english: We wanted to sweat out this sweltering summer.

vlive.korean: [잭슨 타이밍 살피다... 회심의 공격! ] 그에 맞서서 진영 대표! [Looking for the timing, launching an attack!] And Jinyoung! 듣기 View video GOT7 : GOT7의 하드캐리 6화 (GOT7's Hard Carry ep.6)
vlive.english: [Looking for the timing, launching an attack!] And Jinyoung!

vlive.korean: [이에 맞서는 두 번째 팀!] [And their opponent!] View video 내 전공은 힙합(My major is HIPHOP) : Ep 15. 겉바속촉 회기파전 아님! 경희대vs한국외대의 회기파戰에 낀 성균관! 그 결과는?

examples.korean: He called on the people to rise up against the invaders. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 사람들에게 침략군에 맞서서 들고일어나라고 요청했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He called on the people to rise up against the invaders. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He thought people could fight against tyranny with non-violent protests. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 사람들이 비폭력 항의로 압제에 맞서서 싸울 수 있다고 생각하였다. Neungyule
examples.english: He thought people could fight against tyranny with non-violent protests. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The dealer bade against a salesman. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 거래자는 물건 판매상과 맞서서 비싼 값을 불렀다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The dealer bade against a salesman. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: It was hard to fight against longer odds. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 강적에 맞서서 싸우는 것은 힘들었다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: It was hard to fight against longer odds. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The ability to master the largest computing tasks is Sun’s main bulwark against Microsoft’s relentless attacks. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 대량의 연산 작업을 처리할 수 있는 능력이 마이크로소프트의 무차별적인 공격에 맞서서 썬의 가장 큰 방벽이다 YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The ability to master the largest computing tasks is Sun’s main bulwark against Microsoft’s relentless attacks. Add to Wordbook
